meanings.definition: Nellies (noun): A slang term for nerves or anxiety.
meanings.sent1: During the test, my nellies were jumping around like popcorn.
meanings.sent2: She always gets the nellies before speaking in public.
meanings.sent3: His nellies were so jittery, he accidentally spilled his drink.
meanings.sent4: The dark forest at night gave me the nellies.
meanings.sent5: The thought of skydiving gives me the nellies just thinking about it.

meanings.definition: Nellies (verb): To become nervous or anxious.
meanings.sent1: I nellies every time I have to speak in front of a crowd.
meanings.sent2: She nellies before every job interview.
meanings.sent3: Don't nellies about the presentation; you'll do great!
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds nellies the small town.
meanings.sent5: The eerie silence nellies the detective as he enters the abandoned house.
